title: Mad Scientist
desc:
*Don't you want to know what this little thing does?*

This is a moderately tough foe that effectively will always be Regenerating, allowing the fight to last much longer if your damage output is too low.

In addition, once per battle, it is capable of stunning you for a turn. Keep this in mind if you don't have either of the Speedrunner's items equipped for whatever reason. If you have lowish HP when the stun gets triggered, you may unexpectedly get finished off.
